name: Sahuagin Blademaster
proficiencies: Saving Throw: STR +6 | Saving Throw: CON +5 | Skill: Athletics +6 | Skill: Intimidation +4

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy.
special_abilities.desc: The blademaster has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness.
special_abilities.desc: The blademaster can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy.
special_abilities.desc: The blademaster can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The blademaster makes three attacks with its wavecutter blade, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Wavecutter BladeMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: BiteMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: ClawsMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.
